text: int main ( ) { int t , no , a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , i , j , sum ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { sum = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & no ) ; a [ no ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < no ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } for ( i = 0 ; i < no ; i ++ ) { if ( i == no - 1 ) { sum = sum + a [ i ] [ 1 ] ; } else { sum = sum + a [ i ] [ 0 ] ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , sum ) ; } return 0 ; }
